name: Escape the Forest
description:
It was such a nice walk in the forest, but now it's getting quite dark… And you're lost. Can you find your way back to the city? With 5 different ways to die and 4 different outcomes back to the city, can you discover them all?

Notice: This game is my first project from following an Unity3D course, so don't have too high expectations. Any constructive feedback is always welcome!
